ascend_skill.desc:
For Haru's ranged attacks, deal Psychokinesis damage to all foes equal to 66% of Haru's Attack. When using certain skills, gain 1 corresponding Thoughtful Round stack and reload. Up to 3 stacks of Thoughtful Round with different effects can be stacked at the same time.
For each Thoughtful Round stack, grant unique effects to ranged attacks. When Haru uses a ranged attack, increase skill damage based on Thoughtful Round stacks (increase by 20%/40%/50% at 1/2/3 stacks, respectively). If at 2+ Thoughtful Round stacks, also increase Attack by 25%.
After using a ranged attack, remove all Thoughtful Round stacks.
ascend_skill.name: My Name Is Beauty Thief

ascend_skill.desc:
After a new foe appears, activate Extrasensory Aim for that foe at the start of Haru's next turn.
Based on Haru's Target Audience stacks, increase Attack by 8% (up to 24%) and ranged attack critical rate by 6% (up to 18%).
ascend_skill.name: Expressing Emotions

ascend_skill.desc: When Haru has 1+ Target Audience stacks, decrease damage taken by 25%. When at 3+ Target Audience stacks, increase Psychokinesis damage by 60%.
ascend_skill.name: Unwavering Faith

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Mindful Release and Thief Tactics by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Advancing Courage

ascend_skill.desc: Overload Round Enhanced: When using a ranged attack, increase critical damage by 30%.
ascend_skill.name: Straight to the Point

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Extrasensory Aim and Precise Volley by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Giving It My Best Shot

ascend_skill.desc:
When at 2+ Thoughtful Round stacks, evolve Haru's ranged attacks to Resonating Shots. Also, deal a ranged attack that activates all Thoughtful Round effects once. This additional attack's damage is 70% of the original attack.
At 2+ Thoughtful Round stacks, activate the following effects for Thoughtful Round gained from skills.
Focused Round: When using a ranged attack, also decrease the foe's ailment resistance by 27% for 2 turns.
Painpoint Round: When using a ranged attack and Haru has Target Audience, increase pierce rate by 12%.
Spillover Round: When using a ranged attack and Haru has Target Audience, increase critical rate by 20% and critical damage by 20%.
ascend_skill.name: Heroine of Justice

highlight_skill.desc:
Deal Psychokinesis damage to all foes equal to 206.9%/228.1%/219.6%/240.8% of Attack. Gain 1 Overload Round if Haru doesn't have any Overload Round stacks and is below maximum Thoughtful Round stacks.
Overload Round: When using a ranged attack, increase critical rate by 14.6%/14.6%/15.5%/15.5%.
If Haru hasn't gained any Overload Round stacks, increase this skill damage by 14.6%/16.1%/15.5%/17.0%.
highlight_skill.name: Highlight

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Psychokinesis damage to all foes equal to 75.8%/83.6%/80.5%/88.3% of Attack (2 hits). 97.6%/97.6%/103.6%/103.6% chance to inflict 1 Target Audience stack on the main target and 53.7%/53.7%/57.0%/57.0% chance to inflict 1 Target Audience stack on other foes. Then, change Target Audience stacks on foes to Target Audience stacks on Haru and Target Audience's duration to 3 turns. Also gain 1 Focused Round stack.
Focused Round: When using a ranged attack with Target Audience, increase skill damage by 29.3%/32.3%/31.1%/34.1%. After the ranged attack, remove all Target Audience stacks granted to Haru.
normal_skill.name: Extrasensory Aim

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Gun damage to 1 foe equal to 151.6%/167.1%/160.9%/176.4% of Attack. When Haru has Target Audience, increase this skill's pierce rate by 19.5%/19.5%/20.7%/20.7% and gain 1 Painpoint Round.
Painpoint Round: When using a ranged attack, also deal Psychokinesis damage to the main target equal to 39.0%/43.0%/41.4%/45.4% of Attack (can gain skill damage increases from Focused Round).
normal_skill.name: Precise Volley

normal_skill.desc:
Deal Psychokinesis damage to all foes equal to 142.1%/156.7%/150.8%/165.4% of Attack. When Haru has Target Audience, increase this skill's critical rate by 19.5%/19.5%/20.7%/20.7% and gain 1 Spillover Round stack.
Spillover Round: When using a ranged attack, also deal Psychokinesis damage to all foes equal to 29.3%/32.3%/31.1%/34.1% of Attack (can gain skill damage increases from Focused Round).
normal_skill.name: Mindful Release

passive_skill.desc: During battle, increase Attack by 1% for every 1.45% of ailment accuracy (up to 165.0% of Attack). Also increase critical damage by 20% for every 50% of ailment accuracy (stacks up to 3 times).
passive_skill.name: Heiress's Leadership

passive_skill.desc:
Permanently gain 1 Area to Improve stack for each Thoughtful Round stack gained. Gain the following effects based on the number of Area to Improve stacks.
1 stack: Increase ailment accuracy by 18.0% and ailment resistance by 18.0%.
2 stacks: Increase Attack by 18.0% and Defense by 18.0%.
3 stacks: Increase critical damage by 18.0%.
passive_skill.name: Helping Others
